about_the_game:
Adanath is a narrative driven, combat oriented game with RPG elements where you are Adanath, a simple man with a fate sealed by Sumerian gods, venturing into the abyss of unknown to save his lost love & his soul.

In the game players will follow steps of Nina, Adanath’s lost wife. As Adanath ventures into the unknown, he will fight enemies, sometimes friends, and develop his skills & weapons.

With each battle won, Adanath’s story will reveal, and Adanath will follow the story where he will learn his fate was sealed before time, and before human kind
walked the realm.

Narrative Driven
With every battle won & puzzle solved, Adanath will learn more about himself, possess new skills & weaponry, developing into a skilled warrior from a simple city man.


Unique Combat
In every fight, player must find a unique way to defy death. As player progresses through levels, fight after fight, he will need to upgrade his defensive & offensive abilities, as well as equipment, finally into an arsenal that is designed by gods, for gods.


Immersive Pseudo-Historical Art & Design
To create an immersive & re-playable game and a memorable transformation experience from ancient Sumerian technology to deity-created technology, we blended creative design with ultra realistic graphic elements in 2.5D, to give the player a strong bonding feeling with the protoganist. Every frame of Adanath will be a wallpaper material.

content_descriptors.notes: Some blood can be seen at fights

Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10870H CPU @ 2.20GHz, 2208 Mhz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060

short_description: Venture into the archaic mysteries of Sumerian Mythology & follow the traces of your lost love in the eternal battle between men & deities. Rescue Ninna. Rescue your soul.
